definition: someone employed to conduct others, take (someone) to their seats, as in theaters or auditoriums
details:
noun
- someone employed to conduct others
= synonyms: guide
- an official stationed at the entrance of a courtroom or legislative chamber
= synonyms: doorkeeper
verb
- take (someone) to their seats, as in theaters or auditoriums
= example: take (someone) to their seats, as in theaters or auditoriums
= synonyms: show
